initMessages: Determine whether the following statements are true or false.
This exercise is performed backhanded.For each round, 3 statements are presented.
name: Athletes in history

options.question: Alexia Putellas of FC Barcelona has won the Ballon d'Or on more than one occasion
Olga Carmona is the first Real Madrid player to be nominated for the Ballon d'Or
Ada Hegerberg of Olympique Lyonnais has won the Ballon d'Or on more than one occasion
Germany is the country that has won the most FIFA Women's World Cups
The United States is the country that has won the most FIFA Women's World Cups
Japan won the FIFA Women's World Cup in 2011
Brazilian player Marta Vieira de Silva is the top scorer in FIFA women's world cups, with 17 goals
The first FIFA Women's World Cup in 1991 was held in China
Spain won the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup in France
Team Colombia's Linda Caicedo won the award for best goal at the FIFA Women's Cup Australia and New Zealand 2023, for her goal against Germany
Mary Earps of the England team was awarded the best goalkeeper of the FIFA Women's Cup Australia and New Zealand 2023
Michelle Akers and Alex Morgan of the United States team are the two players who have scored the most goals in a single game (5)
Linda Caicedo of Colombia was chosen as the best player of the 2023 Women's World Cup
Aitana Bonmati of Spain was chosen as the best player of the 2023 Women's World Cup
Exactly 61 years of difference separate the first men's and women's soccer World Cup. In 1930 the male and in 1991 the female
